#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

int CountOnes( int n ) {

	int count = 0;
	
	while( n ) {
		
		count++;
		n = n & ( n - 1 );
	}
	
	return count;
}

int main() {
	
	vector<int> A( 1001 );
	int t, n, i, sum;
	
	for( i = 0;i < 1001;i++ )
		A[ i ] = CountOnes( i );
	
	sum = 0;
	for( i = 0;i < 1001;i++ ) {
		
		sum += A[ i ];
		A[ i ] = sum;
	}
	
	scanf("%d", &t );
	
	while( t-- ) {
		
		scanf("%d", &n );
		printf("%d\n", A[ n ] );
	
	}
	
	return 0;
}
